data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vadthanarat, Santhiti, Raspe, Olivier, Lumyong, Saisamorn (2018): Phylogenetic affinities of the sequestrate genus Rhodactina (Boletaceae), with a new species, R. rostratispora from Thailand. MycoKeys 29: 63-80, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.29.22572, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.29.22572
